com.vangav.backend.networks.email

Class MailGunEmailInl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.networks.email.MailGunEmailInl

  • public class MailGunEmailInl
extends java.lang.Object
    MailGunEmailInl has inline static methods for send e-mails using mailgun in order to use mailgun, first register at mailgun.com
